text: Sphingomonas morindae is a Gram-negative, aerobic, short rod-shaped, non- spore-forming and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from the inner tissue of the plant Morinda citrifolia in Sanya on Hainan in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas morindae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase morindae Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Sphingomonas morindae
